1352840.name: Dystopia Punk - Zero Hour
1352840.description:
Dystopia Punk: Zero Hour is a single-player cyberpunk rogue-lite where you fight to reclaim a city ruled by ruthless corporations and warring factions. Infiltrate, sabotage, and take control of districts in a dynamic world that fights back. Every mission is a high-stakes operation - adapt your strategy, unlock new abilities, and recruit allies to fuel the resistance.

The city is alive, and your actions have consequences. Will you dismantle the system or be crushed beneath it?

Key Features:

  • Territory Control & Faction Warfare: Seize districts, weaken corporate control, and shape the balance of power.

  • Rogue-lite Progression & Unlockable Upgrades: Improve your abilities, recruit new allies, and gain cybernetic enhancements.

  • Dynamic World & Reactive AI: Enemies adapt, factions shift power, and the city evolves based on your actions.

Every mission in Dystopia Punk: Zero Hour is an open-ended challenge, combining fast-paced combat, stealth, and strategic decision-making. Explore enemy-controlled districts, complete objectives, and escape with your life. But the city won’t stay static - factions will retaliate, districts will evolve, and new dangers will emerge.

Gameplay Highlights:

  • Rogue-lite Progression: Upgrade skills, acquire cybernetic enhancements, and unlock new gear with each run.

  • District Control System: Take over territory, weaken corporate influence, and shape the balance of power.

  • Multiple Approaches: Stealth, hacking, or all-out combat—every mission is yours to execute.

  • Dynamic World Reaction: Enemies adapt, factions shift alliances, and the city responds to your victories and failures.

This isn’t just a backdrop - it’s a living cyberpunk world that evolves with your actions. Take control of safehouses, strike key locations, and disrupt corporate operations to tip the odds in your favor. But be prepared - the enemy won’t sit idle.

Dynamic World Features:

  • Territory Control: Reclaim districts, unlock resistance support, and change the city’s power dynamics.

  • Faction Influence: Ally with underground groups or provoke rival syndicates - their help (or wrath) will shape your path.

  • Escalating Tension: The more you push, the harder corporations fight back - expect reinforcements, traps, and high-risk missions.

Customize your character, upgrade your abilities, and recruit key allies to strengthen your rebellion. Each unlockable survivor brings unique skills, letting you approach missions in new ways.

Customization & Progression:

  • Unlockable Playable Characters: Expand your roster with unique fighters, hackers, and operatives.

  • Upgrade Cybernetics & Skills: Enhance hacking, combat, and traversal abilities to gain an edge.

  • Gear & Weapon Mods: Adapt your loadout for stealthy infiltrations or full-scale assaults.

  • Expression Matters: Customize every detail, from tattoos to cybernetic enhancements, making each character truly yours.

Your crew, your rules - stand out in a city that’s as dangerous as it is dazzling. Whether you’re blending in for a stealth mission or flaunting your rebellious style. It's not how good you are, it's how good you look like you're doing it

Venture through neon-lit districts, abandoned black-market zones, and corporate strongholds as you fight to take back the city. Find hidden safehouses, uncover deep conspiracies, and strike at the heart of power.

Explore Key Locations:

  • Resistance Safehouses: Upgrade facilities, gather intel, and plan your next strike.

  • Faction-Controlled Zones: Each district has its own dangers, rewards, and shifting allegiances.

  • Urban Verticality: Rooftops, tunnels, and underground networks provide multiple paths through the world.

The city is a battlefield, and only the bold will survive. Take on the megacorps, outmaneuver their enforcers, and turn the tide in favor of the rebellion. Every mission matters. Every choice shapes the war.

Are you ready to reclaim the street?

Wishlist Now on Steam and Take Back Your Future!
